name: transiently
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
for only a short time: She lost consciousness transiently but soon recovered completely. This treatment can relieve the pain only transiently.
More examplesFewer examplesMy attempts to steer her towards a more healthy lifestyle were only transiently effective.The patient's liver function was transiently impaired.People who are in frequent contact with the animals may become transiently infected.The patient's fever transiently improved, though she remained in a critical condition.Whenever governments suffer problems, some of their supporters shift transiently to the minor parties.
